channel.title: Graveyard on HIST1900A
channel.description: Recent content in Graveyard on HIST1900A

item.title: Week 2 Field work and ethical data collection
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back Goals for this week Find a local historic graveyard (see the alternative if necessary) Begin recording some gravestones Create a rough map of the site Listen Your browser does not support the audio element. Right-click and save-as this link to download the audio file DO This week and next you will head out into your local community to map a historical graveyard, and record some gravestones, using a digital recording tool called ‘Kobo Toolbox’.

item.title: Week 3 Field work and ethical data collection II
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back Goals for this week Continue the Graveyard Project and reconsider our recording system Obtain data for the eventual creation of 3d models of grave stones Develop a webmap of the site Explore the connections between what you are doing and what you are reading: graveyards are emotional spaces Listen Your browser does not support the audio element. Right-click and save-as this link to download the audio file
